<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Finishing Follow-through](/Feats.aspx?ID=6140) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 165 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Finishing a foe maintains your swagger. You gain panache whenever your [finisher](/Traits.aspx?ID=802) brings a target to 0 HP.
name: Finishing Follow-through
